sub_fields.label: Select Course
sub_fields.name: select_course
sub_fields.instructions: Please select the course, it will show all the lesson cards under the same course.

sub_fields.label: Alt Link
sub_fields.name: alt_link
sub_fields.instructions: If user logged in, this can be used as button URL

sub_fields.label: Vimeo Video ID
sub_fields.name: video_id
sub_fields.instructions: Use Vimeo video ID including HASH here. https://player.vimeo.com/video/878700279?h=58b52dfdd3

sub_fields.label: Add Space
sub_fields.name: add_space
sub_fields.instructions: Add space in px. This will add vertical space in large screens.

sub_fields.label: Add Mobile Space
sub_fields.name: mobile_space
sub_fields.instructions: Add space in px. This will add vertical space in small screens.
